Title: Senior React Developer
Description:
We are seeking a talented Senior React Developer to join our dynamic team.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain web applications using React
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams  
• Write clean and efficient code
• Participate in code reviews

Join us and make an impact!

Title: Marketing Manager
Description:
Join our marketing team as a Marketing Manager!

You will be responsible for:
• Leading digital marketing campaigns
• Managing social media presence  
• Analyzing marketing performance
• Working with creative teams

Great opportunity for career growth.
Requirements: Marketing degree, 4+ years experience, Google Analytics

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
We're looking for a Data Analyst to help drive business decisions.

Your role will include:
• Analyzing large datasets
• Creating data visualizations
• Preparing reports for stakeholders  
• Working with SQL databases

Remote-first company with flexible hours!
Requirements: SQL, Python, Excel, Statistics background, 2+ years experience
